title: Apple Grabs Exclusive US F1 Rights Starting In 2026 - Apple  ( NASDAQ:AAPL )
summary: Apple Inc. ( NASDAQ:AAPL ) announced on Friday that it will become the exclusive U.S. broadcast partner for Formula 1 beginning in 2026. The five-year deal brings together two globally recognized brands united by innovation, technology, and excellence in entertainment.
